description: Reduces incoming damage by 1.
name: Armor
unlock_via: Default

description: Character pickups items from further away.
name: Attractorb
unlock_via: Finding a vacuum dropped by a light source.

description: High damage, high Area scaling.
name: Axe
unlock_via: Starting weapon.

description: Evolved Whip. Can deal critical damage and absorb HP.
name: Bloody Tear
unlock_via: Evolving the Whip with the Hollow Heart.

description: Increases projectile speed by 10%.
name: Bracer
unlock_via: Reaching Level 4 on the King Bible.

description: Augments area of attacks by 10%.
name: Candelabrador
unlock_via: Reaching Level 4 on the Santa Water.

description: Character gets 10% luckier.
name: Clover
unlock_via: Finding a little clover from a light source.

description: Aims at nearest enemy, has boomerang effect.
name: Cross
unlock_via: Finding a rosary

description: Character gains 8% more experience.
name: Crown
unlock_via: Reaching Level 10 as any character.

description: Evolved Axe. Passes through enemies.
name: Death Spiral
starting_weapon_for: Mask of the Red Death, Death
unlock_via: Evolving the Axe with the Candelabrador.

description: Weapons fire more projectiles.
name: Duplicator
unlock_via: Getting the Magic Wand to Level 7.

description: Bombards in a circular area.
name: Ebony Wings
unlock_via: Getting Peachone to Level 7

description: Fires quickly in four fixed directions.
name: Eight The Sparrow
unlock_via: Surviving 15 minutes with Pugnala.

description: Reduces weapon cooldown by 8%.
name: Empty Tome
unlock_via: Holding six different weapons at once.

description: Fires at a random enemy, deals heavy damage.
name: Fire Wand
unlock_via: Destroying 20 torches.

description: Union of Vento Sacro and Bloody Tear. Critical hits might generate explosions.
name: Fuwalafuwaloo
unlock_via: Evolving the Bloody Tear with Vento Sacro.

description: Damages nearby enemies. Reduces resistance to knockback and freeze.
name: Garlic
unlock_via: Consuming five floor chickens.

description: Summons capricious projectiles. Might interact with pickups.
name: Gatti Amari
unlock_via: Surviving 15 minutes with Giovanna Grana

description: Evolved Pentagram. Generates extra gems and gathers all of them.
name: Gorgeous Moon
unlock_via: Evolving the Pentagram with the Crown

description: Evolved Cross. Can deal critical deamage.
name: Heaven Sword
unlock_via: Evolving the Cross with a Clover

description: Evolved Fire Wand. Passes through enemies.
name: Hellfire
unlock_via: Evolving the Fire Wand with a Spinach.

description: Augments max health by 20%
name: Hollow Heart
unlock_via: Surviving for one minute as any character.

description: Evolved Magic Wand. Fires with no delay.
name: Holy Wand
unlock_via: Evolving the Magic Wand with an Empty Tome.

description: Orbits around the character.
name: King Bible
unlock_via: Starting weapon.

description: Fires quickly in the faced direction.
name: Knife
unlock_via: Starting weapon.

description: Evolved Santa Water. Damaging zones follow you and grow when they move.
name: La Borra
unlock_via: Evolving the Santa Water with an Attractorb.

description: Strikes at random enemies.
name: Lightning Ring
unlock_via: Defeating 5,000 enemies.

description: Fires at the nearest enemy
name: Magic Wand
unlock_via: Starting weapon.

description: Evolved Runetracer. Explodes when bouncing and in retaliation.
name: NO FUTURE
unlock_via: Evolving the Runetracer with the Armor

description: Bombards in a circular area.
name: Peachone
unlock_via: Surviving for 10 minutes as any character.

description: Erases everything in sight.
name: Pentagram
unlock_via: Surviving for 20 minutes as any character.

description: Fires quickly in four fixed directions.
name: Phiera Der Tuphello
unlock_via: Surviving 10 minutes with Pugnala.

description: Union of Phiera Der Tuphello and Eight The Sparrow. Scales with Revivals.
name: Phieraggi
unlock_via: Evolving Phiera Der Tuphello and Eight The Sparrow with the Tirajisu.

description: Character recovers 0.2HP per-second.
name: Pummarola
unlock_via: Surviving five minutes as Gennaro Belpaese.

description: Passes through enemies, bounces around.
name: Runetracer
unlock_via: Surviving 5 minutes as Pasqualina

description: Generates damaging zones.
name: Santa Water
unlock_via: Starting weapon.

description: Evolved Garlic. Steals hearts. Power increases when recovering HP.
name: Soul Eater
unlock_via: Evolving Garlic using the Pummarola.

description: Increases duration of weapon effects by 10%.
name: Spellbinder
unlock_via: Reaching Level 4 on the Runetracer.

description: Raises inflicted damage by 20%
name: Spinach
unlock_via: Starting passive item.

description: Character earns 10% more coins.
name: Stone Mask
unlock_via: Finding it as a stage item for the first time.

description: Evolved Knife. Fires with no delay.
name: Thousand Edge
unlock_via: Evolving the Knife using the Bracer.

description: Evolved Lightning Ring. Projectiles strike twice.
name: Thunder Loop
unlock_via: Evolving the Lightning Ring with the Duplicator.

description: Revives once with 50% health.
name: Tirajisu
unlock_via: Surviving for 20 minutes as Krochi Freetto.

description: Evolved King Bible. Never ends.
name: Unholy Vespers
unlock_via: Evolving the King Bible using the Spellbinder.

description: Union of Peachone and Ebony Wings.
name: Vandalier
unlock_via: Combining Peachone and Ebony Wings.

description: Stronger with continuous movement. Can deal critical damage.
name: Vento Sacro
unlock_via: Surviving fifteen minutes with Zi'Assunta.

description: Evolved Gatti Amari. Might turn anything into gold.
name: Vicious Hunger
unlock_via: Evolving Gatti Amari with the Stone Mask

description: Attacks horizontally, passes through enemies.
name: Whip
unlock_via: Starting weapon
